description: These emotes are much like the dongers above except that they are in love and facing to the right. They all include a heart to make it clear that they are in love with someone or something. Try buiding a scene by adding in more emoticons to clarify what exactly is going on. Otherwise these emotes look kind of strange just looking towards the right all lovingly and such.
